casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 22, 2010

[Cite as 12/22/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-6303.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1785. HSBC Bank USA, N.A. v. Thompson.

Montgomery App. No. 23761, 2010-Ohio-4158. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of the motion for admission pro hac vice of Brian P. Brooks by Benjamin D. Carnahan,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
